description: Produces a full-bodied and smooth cup. Brews 1 cup.

steps.title: Prep & Pre-heat
steps.instructions:
1. Bring your water to a boil then let it cool for about 1 minute.
2. Place circular paper filter in the Aeropress' slotted cap, then attach to the Aeropress body.
 3. Place on top of a coffee cup, and wet the filter. Discard any excess water.

Press 'Next' to continue.

steps.title: Weigh & Grind
steps.instructions:
1. Weigh 10 to 15 grams of coffee.
 2. Place coffee cup on scale, with Aeropress on top.
 3. Pour grounds into the Aeropress body.
4. Enter the grams of coffee you'll brew to the right.

Press 'Next' to continue.

steps.title: Bloom
steps.summary: Pour ${bloomWater} grams of water over grounds.
steps.instructions:
1. Press 'Start Timer', then pour over ${bloomWater} grams of water over the coffee inside the Aeropress.
2. After 45 seconds is up, use the plastic stirer to stir the coffee three times.

steps.title: Press
steps.instructions:
1. Press 'Start Timer'.
2. Once the timer has 30 seconds left, insert the plunger, and apply pressure to press coffee into cup.
3. Cease when you hear a long hiss. Then, remove Aeropress and discard filter and coffee grounds. (Caution, cap is hot).
